metadata.title: CVE-2018-20677 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - low
metadata.description: In Bootstrap before 3.4.0, XSS is possible in the affix configurationtarget property.

criterions.comment: twitter-bootstrap: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
twitter-bootstrap3: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
